subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Jayhawks, hoping to expel their midmajor demons, barely escaped them. Kansas will play in the West Regional final Saturday after holding off Southern Illinois on Thursday night.
snippet: The top-seeded Jayhawks, hoping to expel their midmajor demons, barely escaped them. Kansas will play in the West Regional final Saturday after holding off Southern Illinois on Thursday night.
